Subjective: Suffering from fatigue for approximately 2 months.
No clear cause for the onset of fatigue.

Patient can still exercise normally (climbing 2-3 times a week).
Patient experiences more muscle pain than normal.

Abdomen is not tender to pressure.

There are no abnormalities when pressure is applied to the pelvis.

Plan: Follow-up policy depends on the blood test results.
